    {
      "name": "Scrolling Contents Layer",
      "bounds": [800, 600],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "backgroundColor": "#FFFFFF",
      "invalidations": [
        [45, 18, 20, 19],
        [36, 36, 19, 19],
        [36, 0, 19, 19],
        [27, 18, 19, 19],
        [18, 36, 19, 19],
        [18, 0, 19, 19],
        [9, 18, 19, 19],
        [0, 36, 19, 19],
        [0, 0, 19, 19],
        [0, 18, 10, 19]
      ]
    }
  ]
}
